page.title: 02TEACHING AT MADRESFIELD
page.content: {Mr.White}has taught at {Madresfield {School}for 7 years. He enjoys maths and art. He would like to stay as he feels there is much work that he can still do for the school. The school is about 115 yrs old, and was built by Earl Beauchamp. 2000 pupils have been educated here over the years.Originally children started this school at the age of 5, and left at 14. Now they leave at 11. Over the years the school was enlarged and the field was provided for recreation by Lady Beauchamp. The school has grown from 35 children in 1978 to 65 children in 1985. The Board of Governors,including {Mr.White},has recently increased from 6 to 14 people. By Juliette Virgo and Fiona White.
